data.title: Bertrade De Montfort (1059
data.text:
*Bertrade De Montfort

born Abt 1059 Of, Montfort Amaury, Ile De France, France

died 14 Feb 1117 Fontevrault, France

married (div) 1089 France

father:

*Simon I De Montfort

born Abt 1025 Of, Montfort Amaury, Ile De France, France

died 1087

buried Epernon, Normandy, France

mother:

*Agn√°es D' Evreux

born Abt 1030 Of, Evreux, Normandie

married Abt 1058 Of, Normandie

siblings:

*Amaury De Montfort born Abt 1070 Of, Montfort Amaury, Ile De France, France died 1137

Guillaume De Montfort born Abt 1073 Of, Montfort Amaury, Ile De France, France died 27 Aug 1101

Simon II De Montfort born Abt 1068 Of, Montfort Amaury, Ile De France, France died Aft 1101

Richard De Montfort born Abt 1066 Of, Montfort Amaury, Ile De France, France

died Abt 1092 buried Epernon, France

Adeliza De Montfort born Abt 1075 Of, Montfort Amaury, Ile De France, France

spouse:

*Foulques IV "Rechin" Count of Anjou & King of Jerusalem

born 1043 Of, Anjou, France

died 14 Apr 1109 Of, Anjou, France

children:

*Foulques V "le Jeune" Count of Anjou

born 1092 Of, Anjou, France

died 10 Nov 1143 Jerusalem, Israel

buried Church Of Holy Sepulchre, Jerusalem, Israel

Ermengardis D'Anjou born Abt 1090 Of, Anjou, France died 1 Jun 1146

Geoffrey D'Anjou born Abt 1091 Of Anjou, France died 1106

born 1092 Of, Anjou, France

died 10 Nov 1143 Jerusalem, Israel

buried Church Of Holy Sepulchre, Jerusalem, Israel

biographical and/or anecdotal:

She was married to Philip I King Of France * in 1092.
